message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too high for me. Would you consider $70?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do $80, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.5
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $76?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $77.50, but I'm not going any lower than that.
